1184910.name: Masters of Puzzle - Halloween Edition: Witched Night
1184910.description:
Here is another incredible work by the Ukraine artist Betty Elgyn named Witched Night. This puzzle box is part of our special Halloween Edition series and will be released during our Halloween 2019 event. The illustration is a perfect addition to the Halloween collection and adds something unique to this year's event.


Apart from the usual completion achievements, this puzzle box comes with a very special and limited achievement! Make sure to complete this puzzle in any tileset configuration during the Halloween Special Event in order to get it and see what it is.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, and 2000 puzzle tiles. The puzzle was created from the original illustration in UHD. All the details are exactly as the artist envisioned and created them. This is a puzzle of a low to medium challenge. There are a lot of unique areas and details that will help you build a strong frame of reference and guide you through the assembly process. Higher puzzle tile sets will, of course, provide a greater challenge.

Also, make sure to check the other 2 puzzle boxes in the series: Haunted Mill and Scarecrow Watcher.
1184910.supported_languages: 英语, 保加利亚语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
